Name: Organism Classification Rank
Description: A Organism Classification Rank is an enumerated list of biological classifications such as Species, Genus, etc. to give a taxon rank to an organism classification.

Properties.Name: Lower rank
Properties.Description: Lower ranks are the reciprocal of higher ranks.

Properties.Name: Major Rank
Properties.Description: A major rank is one of the fundamental ranks, i.e. domain, kingdom, phylum/division, class, order, family, genus and species.
